meanings.sent1: She evidenced her talent by painting a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent2: The teacher evidenced the correct way to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The cat evidenced its hunting skills by catching a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His smile evidenced his happiness more than any words could.
meanings.sent5: The bright stars in the sky evidenced the beauty of the night.

meanings.definition: To provide evidence or proof of
meanings.sent1: The fingerprints on the glass evidenced his presence at the scene.
meanings.sent2: The DNA test evidenced his biological relationship to the child.
meanings.sent3: The overflowing laundry basket evidenced a busy week at home.
meanings.sent4: The cracked vase evidenced the clumsiness of the cat's playful antics.
meanings.sent5: The footprints in the sand evidenced the passage of time along the beach.
